name: read-access-result
description: Represents a BACnet ReadAccessResult, providing the results of reading properties from an object.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object from which properties were read.

fields.name: list-of-results
property-identifier
fields.description: The property identifier specifying the property read.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: Optional array index for the property.

fields.name: read-result

options.name: property-value
options.description: The value of the property read.

options.name: property-access-error
options.description: Error encountered while accessing the property.

fields.description: The result of reading the property, either a value or an error.
A list of results for the properties read from the object.
